thread.title: BRIEF-Don Quijote Holdings' Operating Profit For 6 Months Through December Apparently Climbed To About 30 Bln Yen - Nikkei

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Don Quijote Holdings' Operating Profit For 6 Months Through December Apparently Climbed To About 30 Bln Yen - Nikkei
text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - Nikkei:
* DON QUIJOTE HOLDINGSâ€™ OPERATING PROFIT FOR THE SIX MONTHS THROUGH DECEMBER APPARENTLY CLIMBED TO ABOUT 30 BILLION YEN - NIKKEI
* DON QUIJOTE HOLDINGS SALES PROBABLY GREW ABOUT 10 PERCENT TO JUST OVER 460 BILLION YEN FOR THE SIX MONTHS THROUGH DECEMBER - NIKKEI
* DON QUIJOTE HOLDINGS IS LIKELY TO UPGRADE ITS FORECAST FOR THE YEAR ENDING JUNE - NIKKEI Source text: Further company coverage:
